a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Difference between female and male life expectancy at age 45, 1790 to
Female minus male life expectancy conditional on reaching age 45. Estimates are based on period life tables and are expressed
as expected age at death, not as years left to live.
Source: Human Mortality Database (2018) and others
